mixed-citation.article-title: First records and two new species of sipunculans (Sipuncula) from the Southern Mexican Pacific

tp:treatment-sec.p:
as
Lumbricus phalloides
; type locality: coast of Granada . — Fisher 1947: 358–360, as
Sipunculus galapagensis
(Galapagos Islands, in fish stomach). — Cutler et al. 1992: 153–154 (Herradura Bay, Gulf of Nicoya, Costa Rica , 10 m , under debris of coral and in sand). — Dean 2001: 86 ( Puntarenas , Gulf of Nicoya; Conchal Beach, Brasilito Bay, Costa Rica , in fine sand). Questionable records in the TEP.
